Text:
Thanks a lot! I love AvA, and have been looking forward to this album since Love Pt. I came out. Didn't really like the 128 kbps audio quality, but I guess I'll have to wait for the physical CD release to get better quality.

One complaint I had was that the track order was mixed up. I had to manually go through and number them. 

Also, the song "My Heroine (It's Not Over)" is incorrectly labeled. That song is actually called "Crawl". Thanks for the upload!
